content: Stop making a mess during your midnight trips to the bathroom by outfitting your toilet with this motion activated night light. The light is designed to fit any standard toilet bowl and emits a soft glow that won’t overwhelm your groggy state of mind.

Show off your love for photography during your next coffee break by preparing your caffeinated beverage inside this self-stirring camera lens coffee mug. It comes with a button operated mechanism that automatically stirs your coffee and cream when you pour them in.

Keep your furry friend safe and comfy when you’re running around town by sticking them in this pet sling carrier. The ingenious design allows you to conveniently carry your pet while keeping your hands free, and it can hold up to fifteen pounds.

Simplify your laundry routine by streamlining the folding and storing process using the magnetic clothing organization system. It helps fold articles perfectly and comes with a magnetized surface so that you can easily stack them up to keep clothes wrinkle free.

Enjoy a detoxifying steam in the comfort of your own home with the portable sauna. It comes with energy efficient carbon fiber heating panels that you can set to one of five pre-set levels, and features special padded openings for your head and hands for utmost comfort.

If you’re heading into the great outdoors, this fire starting survival carabiner multi-tool should be a no-brainer to pack. It features a sturdy stainless steel frame that has been outfitted with six useful and possibly life-saving tools like a small knife, a screw driver, and a fire starter.

Enjoy the thrill of off-roading remotely by getting behind the controls of the Traxxas R/C Land Rover Defender. It comes with a powerful 21T Titan 550 motor, a heavy duty steel frame, and aluminum shocks that make it ideal for rugged terrain.

Transform any plain patch of land into a cool playground for the kids using the Wonder Wave. This incredibly versatile toy features a Pringles potato-chip-like design that supports 500 pounds and can be used as a chair, hammock, rocker, or like a see-saw.

If you grew up on Space Invaders, you’ll love this virtual reality alien attack game from Sharper Image. It comes with a Bluetooth-enabled blaster that you connect to your smartphone so that you can identify and vaporize the tiny alien invaders right in front of you.

This rugged solar charger and flashlight is a monster battery designed for those that love the great outdoors. This waterproof charger features a 20,000 mAh capacity that lets you charge 4 USB devices simultaneously and comes with a small light ideal for nighttime use.

Mesmerize your eyes with unbelievable optical illusions made by this 3D light show display. This fascinating toy utilizes a simple string to create amazing multi-dimensional shapes and effects that you have to see to believe.

Give your brain a proper workout by trying to solve this fractal jigsaw puzzle. Unlike standard jigsaws, this laser cut fourteen piece puzzle puts your creativity and spacial reasoning skills to the ultimate test as you painstakingly try to solve it.

Indulge in some delicious cookie dough without the risk of salmonella poisoning by digging into this gourmet edible cookie dough. This delectable chocolaty chip treat is nut-free, certified Kosher, and comes ready to eat – making it the perfect garnish for any sweet treat.

Draw the attention of everyone at the park by taking to the skies with this giant octopus kite. As this mammoth 15 meter long octopus gracefully floats through the air, its long, brightly colored tentacles flap around so that you can easily spot it from down below.

Give your humble abode an earthy vibe by creating the ideal lounging environment using these rock pillows. Disguised as a pile of hard stones, each pillow is made from top grade cloth and comes in various sizes and finishes to create a realistic landscape.

Ensure your digital cryptocurrency remains safe from would be digital thieves by storing it inside this Bitcoin hardware wallet. The wallet is easy to set up and automatically pops up on your browser and populates the transaction fields when you go to pay with Bitcoin.

Improve your overall colon health by placing the Squatty Potty bathroom toilet stool right by your porcelain throne. It’s designed to fit any standard toilet and places your body in a more natural squatting position for a quicker and healthier elimination.

Put an end to someone’s constant whining by making light of their complaints with the world’s tiniest violin. Whenever you hear incessant bellyaching coming from their pie hole, simply pull out your tiny instrument and serenade them until they shut up.

Experience your favorite downhill runs like never before by hitting the slopes wearing these sled legs. After strapping them onto your legs, simply take a few running steps and slide down for a one of a kind thrill ride down your favorite hill.

The Amazon Echo Dot is a hands-free, voice-controlled device that uses Alexa to play music, control smart home devices, make calls, send and receive messages, provide information, read the news, set alarms, and read audio books from Audible.

Insert a little color and natural beauty into your home with this rainbow quartz geode. This natural Titanium coated rainbow crystal quartz measures approximately 2.25 inches tall and displays an array of incredibly alluring color combinations.

Winter is coming – ensure you are warm and toasty when the temperature dips by getting under this faux wolf fur bedspread. This luxurious bedspread is crafted entirely from animal friendly faux fur and is given unique style accents to create a realistic appearance.

titleEN: The Subtle Art Of Not Giving A Fuck
content: Get on the path to a better life by learning how to face your fears and faults with The Subtle Art of Not Giving A Fuck. Through profane yet entertaining stories filled with ruthless humor, this captivating read will help you get to know your limitations and how to accept them.

Hulk-out like never before by transforming yourself into Bruce Banner’s alter ego when you put on this Thor Ragnarok Hulk mask. The mask comes with movable eyebrows and a movable mouth piece so that you can let out a loud “Hulk smash!” whenever you want.

Origami and technology collide to bring you the iPhone controlled paper airplane. Unlike the flimsy poor quality paper airplanes you’re used to building, this high tech version integrates state-of-the-art Bluetooth technology to ensure you get the best possible flight.

Add color and whimsy to any part of your humble abode using this peel and stick LEGO brick wall. Compatible with most smooth surfaces, this removable decal kit comes with 4 10 x 10 inch tiles that are ideal for creating all kinds of LEGO sculptures.

Send a clear message to the driver behind you with this driving emoticon message display system. With everything from a middle finger to a thank you display, you’ll finally be able to properly communicate with your fellow drivers during your daily driving commute.

titleEN: Wireless Smart Scale and Body Analyzer
content: Ensure you meet your fitness goals by automatically measuring your weight, calculating your BMI, and monitoring body composition changes in muscle, fat, water, and bone using the wireless smart scale and body analyzer.

Keep your shades looking like new by giving them a gentle rub down with this all-in-one eyeglass lens cleaner. This carbon based eyeglass cleaner will keep your lenses free of fingerprints, smudges, streaks, and grease with just a few simple wipes.

titleEN: Ship In A Bottle Whiskey Dispenser
content: Bring some class to your quaint home bar with this ship in a bottle whiskey dispenser. It’s expertly hand-blown from durable, thick glass and comes with a ground glass stopper to create a hermetic seal so your spirits never evaporate.

Transform nearly any pair of shoes into rugged hiking boots by outfitting them using these ice and snow traction cleats. Tested safe from breakage in temperatures as low as -41 degrees Fahrenheit, they fit over your existing shoes to provide 360 degree traction.

Make your down time at the office more entertaining by admiring the fluid motion of these Newton cradle balance balls. This entertaining device helps demonstrate 3 main physics principles: conservation of energy, conservation of momentum, and friction.

Get a roaring fire going with minimal effort by bringing along the Sparkr plasma lighter and flashlight on your next camping trip. One end of this compact gadget features a windproof electric plasma lighter while the other end contains a 150 lumen flashlight and lantern.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Solar System Decals
content: Give your bedroom a cosmic vibe by hanging up these glow in the dark solar system decals. As soon as the lights go off, the colorful planets and stars transform and begin emitting a bright green glow that will give the room an other worldly vibe.

Quit wasting your time with antiquated fruits and veggies – now you can inhale your vitamins with these vape cartridges! These nicotine and calorie-free cartridges deliver a healthy dose of B12 to your bloodstream in mere seconds.

titleEN: Garmin GPS Speak With Amazon Alexa
content: Transform your vehicle into a smart car by equipping it with this Garmin GPS Speak with Amazon Alexa. Apart from guiding you around town, this handy device allows you to do everything from playing games and music to checking weather and traffic updates.

Forming tight, perfectly shaped rolls is easier than ever when you have this easy sushi roller. It allows you to quickly roll up elegant professional looking rolls in one fluid motion – making this portable appliance great for beginners and pros alike.

This minimalistic credit card sized phone allows you to unplug from the modern world without actually having to disconnect. Apart from calling and texting, all other features are stripped off so that you spend less time on your phone and more time in the real world.

Step aside ladies – it’s the guys turn to slay this summer with the Romphim – the only romper designed for men! This bro-tastic one piece features an adjustable waist, zipper fly, deep front pockets, and seductively short shorts to show off those killer legs.

Look stylish while carrying a functional charging cable on you at all times by accessorizing your outfit with this iPhone charging cable bracelet. It comes wrapped in genuine leather and features 18 karat gold plated hardware.

Only little weaklings make two trips when bringing the groceries into the house. So carry your entire load in one short trip by hooking your bags onto the Mighty Handle. It comes with an ergonomic handle and a pair of hooks that can hold up to 50 pounds in total.

Create some of the most twisted and demented things in all of Westeros by sitting down for a few rounds of Cards Against The Iron Throne. The set includes 58 black cards 221 white cards that are loaded with references from the hit books and television series.

Celebrate the holidays Griswold style by placing this National Lampoon’s Christmas vacation village on display. It depicts iconic and hilarious scenes from the beloved holiday flick such as Clark’s electrocution and cousin Eddie’s camper.

Add a little whimsy to your makeup routine by applying your cosmetics with these unicorn horn makeup brushes. Each brush in this unicorn horn 10-piece set features a flurry of incredibly vibrant pastel colors that match the vibrant carrying case.

Harness the power of deep touch stimulation and simulate the feeling of being hugged with this therapeutic weighted blanket. The blanket is designed to stimulate pressure points on your body that are associated with improved sleep and relaxation.

After you’re finished filling the halls with boughs of holly, fill your liver with alcohol using this Christmas stocking flask. Shaped like Santa’s boot, it’s made from FDA approved food-grade plastic and can hold up to 2.25 liters of your chosen holiday spirit.

Level up your geeky home’s living room by bringing in this Nintendo Game Boy coffee table. This 35.4 x 21.6 x 17.7 inch table comes emblazoned with a high quality graphic depicting the original Game Boy we all know and love.

Now you can ride safe without having to lug around a bulky helmet by upgrading your riding gear with this flat folding bicycle helmet. The intrepid and functional design of the helmet allow you to easily fold it flat so that you can take it anywhere without the added bulk.

titleEN: Objects In Mirror Are Losing Sticker
content: The “objects in mirror are losing” sticker will turn even the most leisurely drive into a constant thrilling race guaranteed to get the adrenaline pumping. It’s a great little humorous touch for any car and makes an ideal gift for drivers with a competitive nature.

This holiday season give “the gift of nothing” to those who truly deserve it. Whether it’s a former lover, an evil boss, or just a spoiled little brat child, the gift of nothing will show how much you care and how much effort you’ve put into giving them something really special.

Build a kickass fort in mere seconds using this air fort inflatable tent. The tent works with any portable fan to instantly inflate and provide your little ones with a cool, secluded, and breezy hangout that they can set up anywhere.

Help your furry friend stay fit while looking dapper by placing this dog bowtie activity monitor on them. This stylish and useful waterproof device syncs with your smartphone to provide you with a real-time analysis of what your dog is doing.

Elevate your paper folding skills to Yoda-like levels by sitting down with this Star Wars paper Kirigami book. Using nothing more than a ruler, a cutting mat, and a utility knife, you’ll be able to craft up to 15 different spaceships from the Star Wars universe.

Bring sexy back to the holiday season by strutting your stuff in this bare chest ugly Christmas sweater. With cutesy reindeers and jolly snowmen combined with festive tattoos and bitchin’ bauble nipple rings – you’re sure to be Mrs. Clause’s favorite naughty boy.

Transform the dead of night into daytime by turning on the world’s brightest spotlight. This lightweight, water resistant spotlight charges in just 3.5 hours, has a lifespan of 50,000 hours, and provides an impressive 4,000 lumens.

Witness the power of the sun by placing the world’s smallest solar powered car under sunlight. This pint-sized vehicle comes equipped with a small rectangular solar panel that covers the entire roof area and powers this tiny ride.

Sleep better than ever before by resting your tired noggin on the no pressure head bed. This one of a kind pillow features a patented hyper-elastic polymer that’s arranged into small triangles to provide core lateral strength, so it won’t ever go flat or sink.

You can finally achieve your dreams of becoming a billionaire by trading in your worthless greenbacks for these invaluable Zimbabwe billion dollar bills. You’ll be able to purchase discontinued currency in either 1, 5, 10, 20, and 50 billion dollar denominations.

Mellow out by relieving daily stress from the comfort of home using this scalp massager. This inexpensive massager comes packed with twelve thin metallic tines that helps increase blood flow and circulation so that you can feel more relaxed.

Learning how to code teaches you how to think – and learning is now more accessible than ever. No matter your age or knowledge level, you can start learning today and be on the path to becoming a full stack developer that everyone will want to hire.

Have Santa grant all your holiday wishes by having him fill up every nook and cranny of the tactical Christmas stocking. With features like a metal clip, six strips of MOLLE, and a rack for shotgun shells, it’s the ideal way for any military veteran to spread a little holiday cheer.

Who says you have to go to a fancy spa to get a deep soothing rub down? This shiatsu neck and back tissue massager comes with a row of 8 deep-kneading shiatsu massage nodes that you can set to 1 of 3 speeds for a relaxing and soothing massage.

Get into the holiday spirit by decking out your fuzzy panty dropper with these eye-catching beard ornaments. Your beard will look fabulous complemented with these bright and festive holiday baubles that come in red, green, silver, and gold. Testing

Entertain your energetic cat for hours with this automatic moving cat laser toy. The laser will move around in various directions, which for some cats – and even some dogs – will be irresistible to chase. The laser toy is especially effective for playful kittens.

Make your childhood fantasy a reality by converting the world around you into real LEGO-like structures by using these life size building bricks. You’ll be able to construct giant structures and real functional furniture – the only limit is your imagination.

Explore the unknown depths on your local watering hole by getting behind the controls of this radio control submarine. This pint sized sub is powered by a dynamic dive system and is modeled after the state of the art U 31 submarine of the German Navy.

Let all the inferior drones know who runs shit in your office using this “fucker in charge” name plate. This office appropriate piece is clearly engraved with a comical and crass title against a classy gold backdrop that will blend in beautifully with any office decor.

Ensure you have a joyous and boozy holiday season by decorating your gorgeous tree with these Christmas tree ornament shot glasses. The tops of these festive baubles can be unscrewed so that you can fill them up with your favorite holiday spirit.

Make your little adrenaline junkie king of the road by getting him on the Huffy electric drifting green machine. It features an ultra durable steel frame and a push button throttle and hand brake that are designed to perform awesome drifting maneuvers.

Stave off boredom in true millennial style with the Sphero mini programmable robotic ball. This programmable JavaScript bot comes with interchangeable shells, fun games, and a feature that lets you control it with just your facial expressions.

Keep loose nuts, bolts, and tools from rolling all over your work space by laying your metallic equipment on this flexible magnetic tool holder. It features a slim, design that sticks and conforms to ferrous surfaces like fenders so that your tools are always close by.

Turn your stove top into a legit pizza oven by preparing your cheesy pie on this specialized pizza pan. This carbon steel pan heats up to over 800 degrees Fahrenheit to cook your homemade pizza in just 3 minutes.

Combinations and keys are now a thing of the past! Keep your valuables safe by protecting them using the smart fingerprint padlock. It employs a capacitive fingerprint sensor that can store up to 500 different users and opens the lock in just 0.8 seconds.

If you were told you could take only one item with you to a desert island, the ultimate Swiss Army knife is THAT ONE ITEM. With over 87 different tools crammed into this one epic package, the ultimate Swiss Army knife is the handiest tool you’ll ever own.

If hot potato’s become too dull for you, up the ante of the classic game with this shocking potato party game. Designed in the likeness of a plump Idaho potato, this high tech spud comes with 3 different game modes that will each deliver a tiny shock to the unlucky loser.

Why waste money on gas transporting your kids all over town when you’ve already got one fully powered dad horsepower vehicle at home? Perfect for the little cowboy or cowgirl at home, this wearable saddle is ideal for some fun western rodeos with dad.

Now you can give the middle finger to old mother nature and people who want to take cover beside you with the middle finger umbrella. Not only will you be sticking it to the rain clouds, but you’ll be staying dry all while making a bold statement.

Avoid tossing and turning while you slumber by placing your body in the ideal position using this side sleep wedge pillow. Made with four types of foam, the design allows you to sleep comfortably on your side without risking arm or shoulder pain.

Dogs are curious animals by nature. The dog peek window allows man’s best friend to more effectively keep watch over his territory from that cowardly neighborhood cat, the conniving squirrel, or those unexplainable plastic bags that always fly by.

Doze off in class or at work without fear of getting caught with this fake awake sleeping tape. Perfect for those groggy early Monday mornings, simply place the tape over your eyelids, prop your head up using your arm, and catch up on some much needed shuteye.

Add a touch of whimsy to your boring old bathroom by placing this bunny tail cotton ball dispenser on the shelf. The fun and brilliant design of this dispenser creates the illusion that you’re pulling off this ceramic bunny’s fluffy white tail every time you go reach for a cotton ball.

Get into the holiday spirit without straying away from your home’s contemporary decor with this modern Christmas tree. Instead of having to deal with sticky sap and dead falling leaves, you can just sit back and admire its lovely ornaments and inviting glow.

Win the parent of the year award by surprising your little whipper-snappers with this kid’s fort building kit. Each kit comes with 44 8″x8″ plastic boards and 46 connectors that your kids can use to make their dream fort into a reality.

Reduce the volume of garbage your home produces by upgrading to the Titan trash compactor. It features a patented, hygienic compaction system that allows it to hold over 3 times more garbage than a regular trash bin of the same size after compression.

Celebrate the dawning of a new era in beauty and erotica with the vivid illustrations of the dragon sex calendar. Each month is graced by a brilliant picture depicting two of the world’s most beautiful creatures performing the most beautiful of Nature’s acts.

You’ll be sleeping with the fishes when you slip into this shark sleeping bag! This sleeping bag also works well as a body pillow or as the most threatening weapon you can wield in a pillow fight – and makes a cool gift to compliment a shark week marathon sleepover party.

Flip off everyone without actually flipping them off by wearing this middle finger pocket cat shirt. The moment someone pisses you off, simply pull down the shirt pocket and the adorable kitty cat will flip off whoever is looking directly at you.

Show off your fondness for wine to by making this barrel cork catcher accent table part of your living room’s decor. This quaint table stands at 20 inches and comes with a central blackboard plaque so that you can personalize it with a custom message.

Get in great shape without setting foot inside a gym by working out on this Bowflex PR1000 home gym. This Bowflex provides anywhere from 5 to 210 pounds of resistance and can be used to perform over 30 different exercises for a total body workout.

Transform your backyard into an open-air game room using this billiards soccer table. The table can be set up on virtually any flat surface and includes sixteen balls, a carpet that provides a smooth playing area, and an oversized triangle to rack your ginormous balls.

Get your party guests socializing without any alcohol by using this conversation starter cards set. This best selling product comes with 135 thought-provoking questions and topics – politics excluded – that are designed to get everyone mingling with one another.

Give your drinks the perfect blend of taste, texture, and temperature with help from the counter top nugget ice machine. Simply fill it up with clean water and you’ll be able to whip up to one pound of easily chewable flavor absorbing nugget ice every hour.

Give your bathroom’s decor a splash of color by swapping out that plain white roll of t.p. for this alluring black toilet paper. This eco-friendly roll is biodegradable, chlorine-free, and won’t stain your skin or clothes when it becomes wet.

Stay classy while getting shitfaced by consuming your bubbly using this mini champagne shotgun glass. Really, why should you have to sip your Dom Perignon calmly like a mature adult when you can chug it down with the speed and grace of college kid on his first spring break?!

Transform the sky into your personal canvas by getting amazing aerial footage with the DJI Mavic collapsible drone quadcopter. It features a 30 minute flight time, a 4.3 mile transmission range, and comes with a sophisticated onboard camera for incredible shots.

Win the award for most holiday spirit this season by topping off your festive outfit with this Christmas light bulbs necklace. This dashing battery operated necklace comes adorned with 13 colorful C7 retro Christmas bulbs that will make you the talk any holiday party.

Walking is difficult. You’ve got to use all those lousy leg muscles, not to mention overload your brain with orders to move each individual leg in a tiring synchronized motion. Thankfully now you can move effortlessly with these electric motorized shoes.

Stay warm while looking like a viking warlord with this bearded viking beanie. The bearded viking beanie is crafted from 100% acrylic yarn and features a majestic burly detachable beard that will keep your face nice and warm on cold winter days.

Get your family off of their electronic devices and interacting with each other by bringing in this 3-in-1 game table into your home. The space-saving design allows you to easily switch between a ping pong table, a pool table, and an air hockey table.

Bring the holiday spirit with you wherever you go by outfitting your ride with the Christmas car tree. This pint-sized tree can easily be mounted onto any car roof, comes with 70 bright LED lights, and folds flat in case you need to go into a parking garage.
